review: Very cool. Use it in the kitchen.
author: D.B. Lewis

review: Great to be able to access movies and tv shows from prime and other accounts.
author: Susie P.

review: This is a really neat device....The only thing I didn't like about it is when there is alot of internet usage going on, the show you're watching just freezes up.
author: Corrine Kay Wiege

review: Amazing. Honestly, I wasn't expecting that much more than a Chromecast but the fire stick is phenomenally versatile. A ton of useful apps and big potential
author: Rob Fox

review: It works perfectly, is easy to set up.
author: DEguy

review: Very quick access to Netflix and the like
author: Justin

review: Far exceeded my expectations.  Works seamlessly with Amazon Prime and Netflix.  Easy to set up and use.  Very fast, and the picture seems much clearer than what I use to get through Chromecast.  Only problem was that I had to go to the store to buy it as it would have taken a month through Amazon.  Great product.
author: Chuck K.

review: Simple to hook up, best purchase all year. Lots of free content with my prime membership. I tell everyone I know about this little miracle. The only flaw is the print  , it is small for reading  summaries  of movies .Amazon will probably correct this as it is a first effort. It is a home run and considering the price a no brainer.
author: Buy the Bay

review: Love it. Makes watching shows so easy.
author: Audrey
